p.s: The play Disgraced, Scene 3 by Ayad Akhtar written in 2013 deals with islamophobia in the post 9/11 era, as well as the interactions of different minorities and the majority in America.

The final part of scene 3 starts, as Jory comes into the room and finds Isaac and Emily nearly kissing.
